query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Dissemination materials (year 3)
result.description: During the course of the project, leaflets, videos and infographics will be produced with the objective of disseminating and communicating the project results and activities in different formats to reach a range of stakeholders. These documents and videos will be published on the project website and distributed through consortium networks and other existing networks at EU and Member State level.

result.title: Container prototype. Evaluation of container performance
result.description: Container prototype. Evaluation of container performance [ITENE; M22]: -This deliverable will include the results of the T2.6. and WP3. -It will be a report on the performance of the whole system (filling sensor, transmission system, reading data, user identification and anti-fraud system) in real working conditions. -The information on this deliverable will be the basis for T2.7. and WP3.

result.title: Report on business case evaluation of 5 demonstration plants
result.description: The five demonstration plants operate according to individual business models and policies within determined regulatory and economic frameworks. The report will evaluate the factors that make the difference between a viable and non-viable AD+NRR business in the states where the demonstration plants are located.

result.description:
Initial version of a communication master plan, including a detailed overview of actions to be undertaken over CIRCUSOL duration, in relation with each Task of the project where communication and dissemination actions can be undertaken. result.title: Specifications required by end users and comparison with sorted material. Pretreatment needed. Final
result.description: [D5.3] Specifications required by end users and comparison with sorted material. Pretreatment needed. Final [AXION, M35]. -This deliverable will include the final results of T5.1. -It will be a report describing the technical specifications required in the material for each one of the applications to be developed: foam boards, automotive parts, bituminous roofing membranes, garbage bags and urban furniture. Also, a comparative will be done with the properties of the materials obtained in WP4. -This deliverable will be the basis for T5.3. and T5.4.

result.title: Final Communication an Dissemination Plan
result.description: The Final Plan for Using and Disseminating Knowledge will describe the project’s dissemination achievements according to activities planned for the duration of the project, as well as any variation and new activities that were initially unplanned. It will include a plan for the further dissemination of results and the planned exploitation (considering scientific dissemination at the level of individual researcher, group of researchers from the consortium, and group of researchers from different institutions outside the consortium). The Final Plan will be planned for two years after the end of the project. It will be structured according to the same dissemination strategies of the initial plan (publication, conferences, Consortium, end-users) and linked to the plan for raising public participation and awareness.
